TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract ISchedulerTask

Docs.summary: Defines a task.

Docs.summary: To be added.
Docs.value: To be added.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property AllocatedNodes As IStringCollection

Docs.summary: Retrieves the names of the nodes that have been allocated to run the task or have run the task.
Docs.value: An interface that contains the names of the nodes that have been allocated to run the task or have run the task.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property ChangeTime As DateTime

Docs.summary: The last time that the user or server changed a property of the task.
Docs.value: The date and time that the task was last touched. The value is in Coordinated Universal Time.

MemberSignature.Value: member this.CommandLine : string with get, set

Docs.summary: Retrieves or sets the command line for the task.
Docs.value: The command to execute. The command is limited to 480 characters.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void Commit() cil managed

Docs.summary: Commits the local task changes to the server.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property CreateTime As DateTime

Docs.summary: Retrieves the date and time when the task was created.
Docs.value: The task creation time. The value is in Coordinated Universal Time.

MemberSignature.Value: member this.DependsOn : Microsoft.Hpc.Scheduler.IStringCollection with get, set

Docs.summary: Retrieves or sets the dependent tasks.
Docs.value: An interface that contains a collection of task names.

MemberSignature.Value: member this.EncryptedUserBlob : byte[] with get, set

Docs.summary: The encrypted user blob.
Docs.value: A byte array that contains the encrypted blob.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property EndTime As DateTime

Docs.summary: Retrieves the date and time that the task ended.
Docs.value: The time the task ended. The value is in Coordinated Universal Time.

MemberSignature.Value: member this.EndValue : int with get, set

Docs.summary: Retrieves or sets the ending value for a parametric task.
Docs.value: The ending value.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property EnvironmentVariables As INameValueCollection

Docs.summary: Retrieves the environment variables that were set for the task.
Docs.value: A interface that contains the collection of variables. Each item in the collection is an interface that contains the variable name and value. The collection is empty if no variables have been set.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property ErrorMessage As String

Docs.summary: Retrieves the task-related error message or task cancellation message.
Docs.value: The message.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class Microsoft.Hpc.Scheduler.INameValueCollection GetCustomProperties() cil managed

Docs.summary: Retrieves the application-defined properties that were added to the task.
Docs.returns: A object that contains the collection of properties. Each item in the collection is a object.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property HasRuntime As Boolean

Docs.summary: Determines whether the task property is set.
Docs.value: Is true if the run-time limit is set; otherwise, false.

MemberSignature.Value: member this.IncrementValue : int with get, set

Docs.summary: Retrieves or sets the number by which to increment the instance value for a parametric task.
Docs.value: The increment value used to calculate the next instance value.

MemberSignature.Value: member this.IsExclusive : bool with get, set

Docs.summary: Determines whether other tasks from the job can run on the node at the same time as this task.
Docs.value: Is true if other tasks from the same job cannot run on the node; otherwise, false.

MemberSignature.Value: member this.IsParametric : bool with get, set

Docs.summary: Determines whether the task is a parametric task.
Docs.value: Is true if the task is a parametric task; otherwise, false.

MemberSignature.Value: member this.IsRerunnable : bool with get, set

Docs.summary: Determines whether the task can run again after a failure.
Docs.value: Is true if the task can run again after a failure; otherwise, false.

Docs.value: To be added.

MemberSignature.Value: member this.MaximumNumberOfCores : int with get, set

Docs.summary: Retrieves or sets the maximum number of cores that the scheduler may allocate for the task.
Docs.value: The maximum number of cores. The default is 1.

MemberSignature.Value: member this.MaximumNumberOfNodes : int with get, set

Docs.summary: Retrieves or sets the maximum number of nodes that the scheduler may allocate for the task.
Docs.value: The maximum number of nodes. The default is 1.

MemberSignature.Value: member this.MaximumNumberOfSockets : int with get, set

Docs.summary: Retrieves or sets the maximum number of sockets that the scheduler may allocate for the task.
Docs.value: The maximum number of sockets. The default is 1.

MemberSignature.Value: member this.MinimumNumberOfCores : int with get, set

Docs.summary: Retrieves or sets the minimum number of cores that the task requires to run.
Docs.value: The minimum number of cores. The default is 1.

MemberSignature.Value: member this.MinimumNumberOfNodes : int with get, set

Docs.summary: Retrieves or sets the minimum number of nodes that the task requires to run.
Docs.value: The minimum number of nodes. The default is 1.

MemberSignature.Value: member this.MinimumNumberOfSockets : int with get, set

Docs.summary: Retrieves or sets the minimum number of sockets that the task requires to run.
Docs.value: The minimum number of sockets. The default is 1.

MemberSignature.Value: member this.Name : string with get, set

Docs.summary: Retrieves or sets the display name of the task.
Docs.value: The display name. The name is limited to 80 characters.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Output As String

Docs.summary: Retrieves the output generated by the command.
Docs.value: The output from the command.

Docs.summary: Retrieves the identifier of the parent job.
Docs.value: The identifier of the parent job.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property PreviousState As TaskState

Docs.summary: Retrieves the previous state of the task.
Docs.value: The previous state of the job. For possible values, see the enumeration.

Docs.summary: Retrieves or sets the run-time limit for the task.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property StartTime As DateTime

Docs.summary: Retrieves the date and time that the task started running.
Docs.value: The task start time. The value is in Coordinated Universal Time.

Docs.summary: Retrieves or sets the starting instance value for a parametric task.
Docs.value: The starting instance value.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property State As TaskState

Docs.summary: Retrieves the state of the task.
Docs.value: The state of the task. For possible values, see the enumeration.

MemberSignature.Value: member this.StdErrFilePath : string with get, set

Docs.summary: Retrieves or sets the path to which the server redirects standard error.
Docs.value: The full path to the file to which standard error is redirected.

MemberSignature.Value: member this.StdInFilePath : string with get, set

Docs.summary: Retrieves or sets the path from which the server redirects standard input.
Docs.value: The full path to the file from which standard input is redirected.

Docs.summary: Retrieves or sets the path to which the server redirects standard output.
Docs.value: The full path to the file to which standard output is redirected.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property SubmitTime As DateTime

Docs.summary: Retrieves the time that the task was submitted.
Docs.value: The time the task was submitted. The value is in Coordinated Universal Time.

Docs.summary: Retrieves the identifiers that uniquely identify the task.
Docs.value: A object that contains the identifiers that uniquely identify the task.

Docs.summary: Gets or sets a task type that defines how to run the command for the task.
Docs.value: A value that defines how to run the command for the task. The default value is .

MemberSignature.Value: member this.UserBlob : string with get, set

Docs.summary: Retrieves or sets the user data associated with the task.
Docs.value: The user data associated with the task. The data is limited to 4,000 bytes.
